characters.name: Tabby Tom
characters.prompt: orange tabby cat, sitting pose, warm orange and brown stripes, big sparkly green eyes, tiny gold bell collar, fluffy tail curled around body

characters.prompt: calico cat with orange white and black patches, standing pose, wearing tiny pastel pink cupcake apron, big sparkly amber eyes, holding a wooden spoon

characters.name: Siamese Suki
characters.prompt: Siamese cat, cream body with dark brown points on ears face paws and tail, big sparkly blue eyes, sitting elegantly, tiny blue bow on neck

characters.name: Ginger Snap
characters.prompt: small ginger kitten, playful pose with one paw up, bright orange fur, big sparkly golden eyes, holding a tiny star-shaped cookie, crumbs on cheeks

characters.name: Mittens
characters.description: White cat with gray paw tips
characters.prompt: white cat with gray paw tips like mittens, sitting pose, big sparkly teal eyes, playing with a pastel pink yarn ball, fluffy chest fur

characters.name: Tuxedo Max
characters.prompt: black and white tuxedo cat, standing upright pose, wearing tiny red bowtie, big sparkly green eyes, one paw adjusting bowtie, dapper gentleman look

characters.name: Dusty Earl
characters.prompt: gray British shorthair cat, round chubby face, sitting pose, big sparkly copper eyes, holding tiny floral teacup, plump and cozy looking

characters.name: Princess Persian
characters.prompt: fluffy white Persian cat, luxurious long fur, sitting on tiny velvet cushion, wearing sparkly pink crystal tiara, big sparkly blue eyes, pink nose, regal pose

characters.name: Scottish Sora
characters.prompt: Scottish fold cat with folded ears, cream and beige fur, wearing chunky knit pastel rainbow scarf, big sparkly round amber eyes, cozy winter look

characters.name: Bengal Blaze
characters.prompt: Bengal cat with golden spotted rosette pattern, dynamic action pose leaping, big sparkly green eyes, holding tiny sparkler firework, athletic and energetic

characters.name: Ragdoll Rosie
characters.prompt: Ragdoll cat with blue point markings, long silky fur, wearing crown made of tiny pink roses and baby's breath, big sparkly deep blue eyes, ethereal and dreamy, floating flower petals around

characters.name: Galaxy Nova
characters.description: Cosmic cat with star crown and cape
characters.prompt: magical galaxy cat, cosmic purple and deep blue fur covered in tiny stars and nebula swirls, golden sparkles throughout fur, wearing tiny golden star crown and flowing starry cape, big sparkly rainbow iridescent eyes, magical floating pose with stardust trail, most majestic and rare
